titles.title: Break Forth, O Beauteous Heavenly Light

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Break forth, O beauteous heav'nly light, and usher in the morning; O shepherds, shrink not with affright, but hear the angel's warning. This Child, now weak in infancy, our confidence and joy shall be; the pow'r of Satan breaking, our peace eternal making.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Break forth, O beauteous heav'nly light, to herald our salvation; He stoops to earthâ€“the God of might, our hope and expectation. He comes in human flesh to dwell, our God with us, Immanuel; the night of darkness ending, our fallen race befriending.
